title: Gather Requirements and Define Architecture (Revised)
description: Thoroughly investigate the existing architecture, pinpoint potential issues, and propose a vision for the MLOpsEnhancer project. Detail the high-level architecture, emphasizing the connection points between machine learning services and other compute services, the adoption of a serverless approach with increased memory model and concurrency limits, as well as any necessary optimization strategies.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the integration of machine learning services with other compute services, and the serverless approach. Consider factors such as scalability, performance, fault tolerance, security, and monitoring. Provide a high-level overview of the components, their interactions, and data flows.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop and implement the backend services required for the MLOpsEnhancer project, including the integration with machine learning services and other compute services.

title: Implement Serverless Infrastructure
description: Set up and configure the serverless infrastructure required for the MLOpsEnhancer project, including the necessary compute resources and scaling mechanisms.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Strategy for MLOpsEnhancer
description: Create a detailed and robust testing strategy for the MLOpsEnhancer project that encompasses unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, and security tests. This strategy should cover all essential components and services, including machine learning models, data pipelines, and compute services, ensuring thorough testing of all critical aspects.

title: Implement Security Measures - Review and Clarification
description: Thorough review and implementation of security measures to ensure the MLOpsEnhancer project is secure and compliant with industry standards and regulations. This includes but is not limited to authentication, authorization, data encryption, secure communication protocols, regular security audits, and incident response plan. A detailed report on the implemented measures will be prepared for documentation.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the MLOpsEnhancer project, including architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
